location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter confirms the receipt of two letters from the Governor General: one addressed to Seyd Ali Aga and the other to the Prince Royal of Persia. William Bruce reports that the letters have been forwarded to their respective addresses.
